price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߒ ߞߍ߫ ߢߊ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߒ ߡߏߦߌߣߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߒ ߞߍ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߕߊ߬ߓߊ߯ ߞߎ߬ߠߊ߲߬ߜߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
